info.description: The Student Recruiting service enables applications to access recruitment information.
info.title: studentRecruiting

tags.name: academicRequirementEvaluation
tags.description: Provides the ability to evaluate potential transfer credit for prospective students and evaluate the resulting academic requirements.

tags.name: Prompt Values
tags.description: Retrieves instances that can be used as values for other endpoint parameters in this service.

get.description: Retrieves instances that can be used as values for other endpoint parameters in this service. Secured by: Manage: Student Prospect Academic Requirement Evaluation Scope: Admissions

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

parameters.name: academicLevel
parameters.description: The academic level of the program of study.

parameters.name: academicUnit
parameters.description: The academic unit of the program of study.

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: The date to filter programs of study that are effective, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default and maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

parameters.name: programOfStudyType
parameters.description: The program type of the program of study.

post.summary: Calculates evaluation results for potential transfer credit and academic progress.
post.description: Creates a single evaluation results instance with the specified data. In the request body, specify at least these required fields: primaryProgramOfStudy {id}, {startDate}, transcripts[]. Secured by: Manage: Student Prospect Academic Requirement Evaluation Scope: Admissions

get.description: Retrieves all programs of study. You can filter the programs of study by academic unit, academic level, program type, and effective date. Secured by: Manage: Student Prospect Academic Requirement Evaluation Scope: Admissions
